name: TOWER DEFENSE 01
description:
Build towers, upgrade them, stop the red blocks getting from A to B. Don't be scared to pause and regroup.

Tower Defense 01 is a fast, frustrating, addictive game that will challenge your strategy and test your decision-making.

  • 3 attack towers with different strengths, weaknesses and upgrades.
  • 3 passive towers that affect damage, range and reload.
  • A range of weak, strong, fast and slow red block enemies.
  • Multiple tricky levels.
  • Play at normal or hard difficulty.

Easy to play, deceptively difficult to beat!
